reviewText: I purchased this from Presto, a UK dealer.  The good news is that it is for all regions and plays well on my Blu-ray player here in the USA, The bad news is that the program is only 60 minutes long.  There are 14 selections.. Rita Streich sings Schlechtes Wetter in 1965; Elisabeth Schwarzkoph sings Morgen and Mein Vater hat gesangt accompanied by Gerald Moore in 1970 and Ruhe, meine Seele, Meinem Kinde, Muttertandelei, Zueignung, and Waldseligkeit accompanied by orchestra in 1967-8. Finally she and Hertha Tooper sing Kann mich auch an ein Madel erinnern from Der Rossenkavalier. In conclusion Irmgard Seefried sings Morgen, Wiegenlied, Traum durch die Dammerung, Zueignung, and Standchen accompanied by orchestra in 1965.
The great incomparable Elisabeth Schswarzkopf and others singing Strauss
